name: Cosmic Panic!
description:
This is a QIX-like game featuring characters from the online game CosmicBreak!
Clear a stage to get cute illustrations of the characters from CosmicBreak!!

【How to play】
Control your character to create an area on the game field by drawing lines while avoiding collisions with your enemies.
You will clear a stage either when the created area covers 80% of the game field or if you beat all the enemies.

【Controls】
You can move your character and draw a line by dragging your finger on the screen.
A field surrounded by lines you made will be the area you secured.
You can even destroy an enemy if it is captured within the created area.

【Life Recovery】
It is an item you can use when you lose a game. It revives your character with fully restored life.
You can purchase the item in the shop found in the stage selection screen.

【Supported】
iPhone3GS or above (iOS4.3 or above)
